text:
Excellent Service and Professional Team!

I had a fantastic experience at K√§rcher Center. The staff was professional, knowledgeable, and extremely helpful from start to finish. They diagnosed the issue quickly and repaired my vacuum cleaner efficiently free of charge.

The customer service was outstanding. I highly recommend to anyone in need of reliable and honest repair services.

Thank you for the great service! I‚Äôll definitely be returning if I ever need repairs in the future.

I was at the Service Centre at 905 am today,, my v cleaner cannot be powered up, the front desk technician that spoke to me was super patient with me, he checked the plug head and said politely  to wait for him cos' he can get it fixed on the spot. I left the centre at 920 am. He knows his work, his eagerness to help me and politeness make the brand so world class. I have been here 2-3 times over the years and the customer experience never fails me. This should set an example for many other brands to learn and follow. Great Job!

I am a regular user of wet vacuum.
Recently i tried using karcher wet vacuum, nearly 2 k for a no standard n disappointing vacuum.
It cuts my fingers and the brush needs to remove all dirt, dust every single use. I knew we need to remove the water every use but the filter is so dirty, the dirt n dust does not suck into the water. The cleaning is worse than using simple dry vacuum. Will never trust this.

Super friendly and efficient customer service. The service centre is very well kept. Very very clean. Ample free parking too. Only negative feedback is too far from city centre üòÖ but other than that all‚Äòs great! üëç

I attended the Karcher service centre for vacuum cleaner repairs. Staff were attentive and friendly,  and the showroom was immaculate. Service was completed in an efficient mamner while I waited in a comfortable area and was able to help myself to free-flow snacks and refreshments. In all, I was happy with my experience.
